platform.summary: A simplified, workflow-centic interface to Galaxy, focused on genomics data from hardwood trees.
comments: Workflows for quality control, short read mapping, functional gene annotation, RNA-Seq differential gene expression and variant analysis.
quotas: You must [create an account](https://www.hardwoodgenomics.org/user/register) to use this service
